data.title: Some syntax, druid parser does not recognize · Issue #788 · actiontech/dble
data.meta_description: dble version： 5.6.29-dble-9.9.9.9-359645c-20181029082136 preconditions ： no configs： schema.xml <?xml version="1.0"?> <!DOCTYPE dble:schema SYSTEM "schema.dtd"> <dble:schema xmlns:dble="http://dble.cloud/"> <schema name="mytest" sqlMaxLi...
